pattern: What do you do for a living?
No, I don't. I work too much to have time for one. How about you?
I work a lot too. I'm a stay at home mom. What do you do for work?
I work at a library. It's a lot of fun, and I get to meet lots of interesting people.
I work at a grocery store, so I deal with a lot of gross things, too.

i am a scientist. Do you have any of your hobbies?
